name: Stealen Cloak
description:
You are Stealen Cloak, the finest rogue in the land. Your enemies fear you, your friends adore you, and your ego is definitely not inflated!

Loot and kill your way through procedurally generated dungeons so that you may gather enough coin to build a safe haven for you and your allies.

Control scheme:

WASD to move

Space to Dodge

E to interact with chests and stairs

Left mouse button to attack.

Please do enjoy.

Created by

Krisec ( https://www.itch.io/profile/krisec) 

cowbolt ( https://itch.io/profile/cowbolt )
